messages.subject: RE: HEM's response to my complaint
messages.msgSnippet: My subscription to HEM lapsed years ago.  I did love reading Sandra s column, and some of the others.  Didn t Carol Narigon write a column, too? My memory is
messages.messageBody:
My subscription to HEM lapsed years ago. I did love reading Sandra's
column, and some of the others. Didn't Carol Narigon write a column, too?
My memory is fuzzy.

The fact that they will no longer be carrying Sandra's column coupled with
the fact that they've decimated the unschooling.com boards speaks volumes.

I'm still waiting to see how they revise those, though I will miss the
archives. I was wanting to do a search after a visit last weekend to my
SIL's.

My SIL has a bright orange note prominently displayed on her kitchen
bulletin board:

"Obedience--cheerfully, completely, immediately."

I about puked over that one.

Janet
